1	1	1	1	1	1	1	1
2^7	2^6	2^5	2^4	2^3	2^2	2^1	2^0
128	64	32	16	8	4	2	1

10101010 = 128 + 32 + 8 + 2

11001100 = 128+64+8+4


11000000.168.10.10
11111111.255.0.0	// 1 : NET PREFIX / 0 : UnPREFIX
----------------
NETIP : 192.168.0.0
HOSTRANGE : 192.168.0.1 - 192.168.255.254
BIP : 192.168.255.255
-----------------------------

00000000 = 0
00000001 = 1
00000011 = 3
00000111 = 7
00001111 = 15
00011111 = 31
00111111 = 63
01111111 = 127
11111111 = 255

10000000 = 128
11000000 = 192
11100000 = 224
11110000 = 240
11111000 = 248
11111100 = 252
11111110 = 254
11111111 = 255

비트범위 - 숫자값
1bit = 2(0-1)
2bit = 4(0-3)
3bit = 8(0-7)
4bit = 16(0-15)
5bit = 32(0-31)
6bit = 64
7bit = 128
8bit = 256
